title: AirPlay Engineer
summary: The Audio and Media Technologies Group (AMT) is looking for a creative, self motivated and dedicated software engineer to join the AirPlay team to help build the future foundations of AirPlay. Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work. Every new product we build, service we create, or Apple Store experience we deliver is the result of us making each other’s ideas stronger. That happens because every one of us shares a belief that we can make something wonderful and share it with the world, changing lives for the better. It’s the diversity of our people and their thinking that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do. When we bring everybody in, we can do the best work of our lives. Here, you’ll do more than join something — you’ll add something
description: As an AirPlay engineer, you will be responsible for prototyping breakthrough ideas, developing features, contributing to systems design, analyzing performance in the foundations of AirPlay technology. You will build the future of AirPlay. To be successful in this role, you need to be versatile and able to thrive in a fast paced environment. You must be a team-oriented professional with excellent communication skills, excellent judgment, integrity and the ability to make timely and sound decisions. You must have strong technical and programming skills, and a solid understanding of multithreaded programming and programming on realtime systems. You have a background in Video or Audio technologies and have a good understanding of the various media formats. Experience with performance analysis and optimizations is a plus
key_qualifications: Strong programming skills with C/C++. Solid understanding of multithreading and concurrency fundamentals. Familiarity with Media Playback fundamentals, audio and/or video streaming. 3+ years industry experience
education_experience: BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
